text: Gay () is the name of a few settlements in Russia. == Urban localities == * Gay, Orenburg Oblast, a town in Orenburg Oblast == Rural localities == * Gay, Samara Oblast, a settlement in Bolsheglushitsky District of Samara Oblast * Gay, Udmurt Republic, a village in Kyyludsky Selsoviet of Uvinsky District of the Udmurt Republic
title: Gay, Russia
